data.name: Tales of the Elements 2C - Original Album
data.detailed_description:
Played the game? Now listen to the album!

Those who purchase this album will be able to listen to the story of Tales of the Elements 2nd Chapter told from different perspectives than in the game!

Tales of the Elements 2C is the full-length vocal album produced and recorded by Last BeNeVoLeNcE featuring Mega Ran, Kharisma, Impermanence, According to Legends, Sai Wai, and J-Mylez.

Tracklisting:

1. Title Theme (feat. Sai Wai)
2. Recollection
3. By The Way (feat. According to Legends)
4. Meanwhile (Search Party) Part 2 (feat. Mega Ran & Kharisma)
5. The Sandman (feat. J-Mylez)
6. Spray-Paint Bandits (feat. Impermanence)
7. Exposure (feat. Impermanence & According to Legends)
8. Heroes of Polyphony (feat. J-Mylez)
9. Side Quest (feat. Kharisma & Mega Ran)
10. Inner Struggle (feat. Mega Ran)
11. Fall of the Sandman
12. The DJ Who Smells of Sunflowers (feat. According to Legends)
13. Legends of The Black Mic Part 2 (feat. Mega Ran)
14. Saving Point Part 3
15. Setting the Stage (feat. Mega Ran & Impermanence)
16. The Hip Hop Census (feat. Kharisma, Impermanence, & Mega Ran)
17. Alternative Endings (feat. Kharisma, Impermanence, & Mega Ran)


All 17 tracks are in high-quality 320kbps mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: This album is downloaded into the game folder which is found in the Steam Directory at: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Tales of the Elements
